welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Myers, where the beautiful beaches, charming downtown, and rich history await you. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southwest Florida International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic and international flights for Delta and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte County Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Charlotte County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Immokalee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal is available for private and chartered flights at Immokalee Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
